definition: great streets and small alleys (idiom); everywhere in the city
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Her songs were spread about the streets in the mainland of the country.
sentences.chinese: 她的歌传遍祖国大陆的大街小巷。

sentences.english: In recent months, the streets of the city of Chongqing have been ringing with song.
sentences.chinese: 近几个月来，重庆市的大街小巷歌声嘹亮。

sentences.english: Like a swallow in vagrancy, covering all the streets and lanes in the Capital.
sentences.chinese: 像一只流浪的燕子，穿梭于京城的每个大街小巷。

sentences.english: It will be in the avenues and alleys of Tripoli.
sentences.chinese: 相反，它来自于的黎波里的大街小巷。

sentences.english: They ride through the streets pulling passengers and goods.
sentences.chinese: 车夫们穿梭在大街小巷来送客和送货。

sentences.english: Merrymaking filled the streets from dawn onward.
sentences.chinese: 从清晨前开始狂欢者就充满了大街小巷。

sentences.english: Volantis was overrun with white dwarf elephants.
sentences.chinese: 瓦兰提斯大街小巷到处都是白矮象。

sentences.english: I love you one day I will be traversing the streets alone.
sentences.chinese: 我的爱，终有一天我会独自踏遍你的大街小巷。

sentences.english: It'll be cruising on the streets of the U. S. A. this week.
sentences.chinese: 这周，您就能在美国的大街小巷中看到它了。

sentences.english: Rumors had already spread along the streets and lanes.
sentences.chinese: 大街小巷早就传遍了各种流言蜚语。

sentences.english: Below the gray roof tiles, the lanes and alleys were throbbing with activity.
sentences.chinese: 那片灰瓦下的大街小巷涌动着活力。

sentences.english: Cars are parked throughout their city.
sentences.chinese: 供出租的汽车则停放在城市的大街小巷。

sentences.english: Qing has found many interesting things in old-timey streets and avenues.
sentences.chinese: 他穿行古香古色的大街小巷，发现很多有趣的玩意。

sentences.english: Gold is becoming the latest fad to hit the streets of New York.
sentences.chinese: 黄金正成为风靡纽约大街小巷的最新时尚。

definition: top of streets, bottom of alleys (idiom); everywhere in the city
north and south sides of the Yangtze River (idiom)/(fig.) all over China
endless stream of horse and carriages (idiom)/heavy traffic
Mancheng county in Baoding 保定[Bao3 ding4], Hebei
